text: Graderia fruticosa is a species of plant in the family Orobanchaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry shrubland and rocky areas. ==References== Category:Orobanchaceae Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Graderia fruticosa
